Watershed Sprint1
Email Password Sign in or register Sign in This email address is invalid This password is too short This password is incorrect This field is required "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
SignUpActivity First Name Last Name Street Address City State Affiliation Password Zip Code Verify Password Open Camera Create Account Forgot Password? Sign In Step 1: Collect Supplies Atrazine Test Strips Vials to hold water Next Step Step 2: Collect water sample Gather water in your container from the water source you are testing. Step 3: Place water sample into test vial Using the dropper, place your water sample into the test vial. Be careful to use only one dropper full of water. Step 4: Place the test strip in the vial Swirl the water in the vial gently for several seconds and then place it on a flat surface. Place the test strips in the vial with the arrows pointing down. Step 5: Wait 10 minutes Time Remaining Do not disturb the strips or vial during this time. Blue lines will appear on the strips. Input Data Step 6: Determine result Take the strip out and read the results. Negative: The bottom line is darker than the top line. Positive: The top line is darker than the bottom line or the lines are equally dark. Step 6: Take a picture Take picture SUBMIT Positive Negative Invalid/Unsure Test Strip Wizard Atrazine Test Strip Tutorial This quick tutorial will walk you through the testing process as well as show you how to determine your test results and send them to the Nebraska Watershed Project team. Start Tutorial CONGRATULATIONS! You have successfully submitted your test results to the Nebraska Watershed Project team! Test Again SHARE Contact Us unonwn@unomaha.edu Please send us your comments or questions.\nIf sent here from creating a new account or logging in, there is a problem, please report your findings manually Send Please enter your message here. Nebraska Watershed Network Citizen Scientist Question/Comment Back Home If successful, you will be returned to sign in My Data Open the pesticide strip pouch and remove the contents. The packet should contain a test vial, a dropper pipette, one atrazine test strip, and a desiccant (to be discarded). //array for multistate toggle button
